name: Alexandria Jordan
coverLetter: Been trimming for 8 years, depending on the quality and standards, trim 1 to 3lbs a day. I have my own supplies, scissors, apron, tray & basket. Can provide food, I have tent and sleeping accommodations but would love to be off the ground. I have a reliable 4x4 vehicle. Prefer to get 200 a lb for quality bud, but will do 175 & 150. I can identify many strains and love cannabis and the healing aspects.
